result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Brett E Reetz.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file. State moves to dismiss charges upon pleas in 15-CF-113 & 15-CM-136. Court so orders, dismisses charge but reads in for sentencing purposes. Court dismisses 15-FO-340 but reads in for sentencing purposes. Bond is no longer in effect.
Defendant's sister called. He does NOT live at 252 Thorn St, Apt. 2 and she does NOT want his mail delivered there.

ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Savage
Current: 1203 S. Duluth Avenue, c/o Door County Jail, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235 United States  (Effective: 09-11-2015)
Prior: 252 Thorne Street, Apt. 2, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235

Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Brett E Reetz.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court reviews events in file. Defense waives reading of the complaint, enters not guilty plea. Court finds probable cause for bindover. Bond remains in effect.  Status conference scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.
To be fingerprinted and photographed before leaving the Justice Center.

Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Gregory A. Gerbers.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Gerbers indicates he has a conflict with representing defendant, will have counsel appointed to represent defendant in all files.   Copy of Complaint given to Defendant in Court.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel. Court adjourns matter to allow PD office to appoint new counsel. Bond remains in effect.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.

Defendant was fingerprinted by jail staff.  (fingerprint card destroyed 11/10/15)
